text: And little did people know (and most still don't know) that the "Final" in Final Fantasy was to be Squaresoft's last game (hence the name Final Fantasy) before filing for bankruptcy. But they ended up making a lot of money from it and becoming what it is today.

author: Drew Griffin

text: This is from the Amiga version. Back when I was a kid, I had Ghost 'n' Goblins on the NES and I couldn't pass the first stage. This track is from the legendary Tim Follin and was composed back in 1988, which is really impressive. I can identify a Follin track almost instantly, especially with what I like to call the Follin synth starting at 1:25 on the right side and then throughout the rest of the track.
author: SupraDarky
